descriptionHtml:
Finally! You complete the quest and get the Illusion Master Spells, the most powerful forms of these spells. You try them out and... they stink. So, this mod aims to fix that!


This mod changes some aspects of the Master-Level Illusion Spells.

Mayhem:
Increased Max Level
Increased Duration


Harmony:
Increased Max Level
Increased Duration


Hysteria:
Increased Max Level
Increased Duration

I did not change any aspects of Call to Arms, as I've never actually used it in a playthrough and so far looks fine to me.

I did not modify the costs to cast these spells, because I thought they were probably high enough.

If enough people tell me this is too OP, I will make a version that is a bit less so.
author: WhiteWarrior625
